members.name: ClientHandlerOptions
baseUrl
contractHash
fetch
headers

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a client-side interpreter that proxies all operations to a server.
 *
 * Each handler resolves its TypedNode children via `eval_()`, then sends the resolved data to `{baseUrl}/mvfm/execute` as a JSON POST.
 *
 * @param options - Handler options.
 *
 * @param nodeKinds - Node kinds to create handlers for.
 *
 * @returns An Interpreter that proxies all operations to the server.
 */
members.name: clientInterpreter

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates an interpreter for `twilio/*` node kinds.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link TwilioClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @returns An Interpreter handling all twilio node kinds.
 */
members.name: createTwilioInterpreter

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a unified evaluator using the twilio server interpreter.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link TwilioClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @param baseInterpreter - Base interpreter for evaluating sub-expressions.
 *
 * @returns An async AST evaluator function.
 */
members.name: serverEvaluate

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a server-side interpreter for `twilio/*` node kinds.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link TwilioClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @returns An Interpreter for twilio node kinds.
 */
members.name: serverInterpreter

members.docComment:
/**
 * Twilio plugin factory. Namespace: `twilio/`.
 *
 * Creates a plugin that exposes messages and calls resource methods for building parameterized Twilio API call AST nodes.
 *
 * @param config - A {@link TwilioConfig} with accountSid and authToken.
 *
 * @returns A PluginDefinition for the twilio plugin.
 */
members.name: twilio
TwilioCallContext
fetch
TwilioCallsResource
create
list

members.docComment:
/**
 * Twilio client interface consumed by the twilio handler.
 *
 * Abstracts over the actual Twilio SDK so handlers can be tested with mock clients.
 */
members.name: TwilioClient
request

members.docComment:
/**
 * Configuration for the twilio plugin.
 *
 * Requires accountSid and authToken for Basic auth against the Twilio REST API.
 */
members.name: TwilioConfig
accountSid
authToken
twilioInterpreter
TwilioMessageContext
fetch
TwilioMessagesResource
create
list

members.docComment:
/**
 * Twilio operations added to the DSL context by the twilio plugin.
 *
 * Mirrors the twilio-node SDK resource API: messages and calls. Each resource exposes create/fetch/list methods that produce namespaced AST nodes.
 */
members.name: TwilioMethods
twilio

members.docComment:
/**
 * Wraps a Twilio SDK client into a {@link TwilioClient}.
 *
 * Uses the SDK's `request()` method to send requests, preserving the SDK's built-in authentication and configuration.
 *
 * For POST requests, params are sent as `data` in the request body. For GET/DELETE requests, params are encoded as query string parameters on the URI.
 *
 * @param client - A Twilio SDK client instance conforming to TwilioSdkClient.
 *
 * @returns A {@link TwilioClient} adapter.
 */
members.name: wrapTwilioSdk
